title: Fontforge-mingwin \>\>\> Conversion from Mac (Type 1) to Windows (otf or ttf)
content:
Hello Typophiles

I have some mac fonts that I would like to use on my pc.  
Tha mac fonts are Type 1 fonts, I need to convert them into .otf or .ttf.

I downloaded fontforge-mingwin; but I have now no clue how to proceed.

Does someone here has the experience doing so?

Many many thanks in advance for your help -  
You will be both a genius AND an angel.

k21k
author: k21k

comments.content: Instead of using Font Forge I would contact the foundries from whom I had licensed the type and ask if it is possible to change my license to PC and get new fonts. For most foundries: If you do any modifications you are nullifying the EULA.
